oscar.Gui.ThemeManager

Description: This class is a base class for defining methods and event calls for theme gui managers.

Summary
oscar.Gui.ThemeManagerDescription: This class is a base class for defining methods and event calls for theme gui managers.
Functions
draw Draws themes contained in the themes array.  This methodshould be overridden by the implementing class.
addTheme Takes in a theme object to be stored.
deactivateAllThemes Cycle through the view controls anddeactivate any active themes.

Functions

draw Draws themes contained in the themes array.  This method

should be overridden by the implementing class.

addTheme Takes in a theme object to be stored.

deactivateAllThemes Cycle through the view controls and

deactivate any active themes.
